agenda.description: SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Administration TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Monday, April 15, 2019 PLACE: 2E.20 (Betty King Cmte. Rm.) CHAIR: Senator Bryan Hughes SCR 7 Seliger Designating the second Saturday of September as Quanah Parker Day for a 10-year period beginning in 2019. SCR 18 Campbell Designating Kyle as the official Pie Capital of Texas for a 10-year period beginning in 2019. SB 281 Zaffirini Relating to the use of respectful terminology in provisions of Texas statutes relating to the deaf community. SB 430 Lucio Relating to designating June 13 as Blue Tie Day. SB 907 Hughes Relating to the preservation and improvement of the Republic of Texas Granite Boundary Marker. SB 1693 Fallon Relating to designating November 7 as Victims of Communism Day. The committee will certify bills for the Local and Uncontested Calendar to be held on April 17, 2019, at noon or upon adjournment.
